00019 #ifndef _POSIX_SEM_H
00020 #define _POSIX_SEM_H
00021 
00022 #include <nucleus/thread.h>       /* For cobalt_current_thread and
00023                                    cobalt_thread_t definition. */
00024 #include <nucleus/registry.h>     /* For assocq */
00025 
00026 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00027 
00028 typedef struct {
00029     u_long uaddr;
00030     unsigned refcnt;
00031     cobalt_assoc_t assoc;
00032 
00033 #define assoc2usem(laddr) container_of(laddr, cobalt_usem_t, assoc)
00034 } cobalt_usem_t;
00035 
00036 void cobalt_sem_usems_cleanup(cobalt_queues_t *q);
00037 
00038 struct cobalt_sem;
00039 
00040 int sem_getvalue(struct cobalt_sem *sem, int *value);
00041 
00042 int sem_post_inner(struct cobalt_sem *sem,
00043                    cobalt_kqueues_t *ownq, int bcast);
00044 
00045 int cobalt_sem_init(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem,
00046                     int pshared, unsigned value);
00047 
00048 int cobalt_sem_post(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem);
00049 
00050 int cobalt_sem_wait(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem);
00051 
00052 int cobalt_sem_timedwait(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem,
00053                          struct timespec __user *u_ts);
00054 
00055 int cobalt_sem_trywait(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem);
00056 
00057 int cobalt_sem_getvalue(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem, int __user *u_sval);
00058 
00059 int cobalt_sem_destroy(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem);
00060 
00061 int cobalt_sem_open(unsigned long __user *u_addr,
00062                     const char __user *u_name,
00063                     int oflags, mode_t mode, unsigned value);
00064 
00065 int cobalt_sem_close(unsigned long uaddr, int __user *u_closed);
00066 
00067 int cobalt_sem_unlink(const char __user *u_name);
00068 
00069 int cobalt_sem_init_np(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem,
00070                        int flags, unsigned value);
00071 
00072 int cobalt_sem_broadcast_np(struct __shadow_sem __user *u_sem);
00073 
00074 void cobalt_semq_cleanup(cobalt_kqueues_t *q);
00075 
00076 void cobalt_sem_pkg_init(void);
00077 
00078 void cobalt_sem_pkg_cleanup(void);
00079 
00080 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00081 
00082 #define COBALT_SEM_MAGIC (0x86860707)
00083 #define COBALT_NAMED_SEM_MAGIC (0x86860D0D)
